title: The Cornish Trilogy: The Rebel Angels / What's Bred in the Bone / The Lyre of Orpheus
description: Woven around the pursuits of the energetic spirits and erudite scholars of the University of St. John and the Holy Ghost, this dazzling trilogy of novels lures the reader into a world of mysticism, historical allusion, and gothic fantasy that could only be the invention of Canada's grand man of letters.
author: Robertson Davies
